description: Try our easy to follow Rainbow Fruit Jelly Cups recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Jelly,Low saturated fat,Seafood free,Low salt,Blueberry,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Sesame free,Quick & easy dessert,Stone fruit,Strawberry,High fibre,Soy free,Wheat free,Apple,Low fat,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Rainbow Fruit Jelly Cups Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Prepare the fruit. Peel kiwifruit, quarter lengthways and slice.
Remove top from strawberries, halve and slice. Dice apple, pear and nectarines.
Dissolve 3 teaspoon of the gelatine in 1/4 cup boiling water. Whisk well until dissolved. Cool for 5 minutes then stir in 2 cups of juice.
Spoon some of the prepared fruit and blueberries into the base of each plastic cup. You can use a mixture of fruit if you like. Pour a cup of juice over fruit to cover.
Place a spoon into the juice. Chill in the refrigerator for about 20 minutes until set.
While the first layer of jelly is setting, dissolve the remaining gelatine in boiling water as before. Repeat layers of fruit and jelly.
